Title: Miniature Star
Description:
A ball of flaming light, barely a hand's width across.
Its light burns your eyes, and you feel its malice somehow portrayed through its featureless landscape of roiling plasma.
It hates you. It hates what you are. But it adores your presence here, for your deliciously singeable skin is within reach of its mass of millions-of-degrees hot tendrils of hydrogen.

Title: Drones
Description: A swarm of robotic drones, perhaps originally intended for repair jobs; now outfitted with firearms and each covered in scrapes and burns.

Title: Robotic Arm
Description: An advanced prosthetic limb, severed and taken over by a lump of pulsing flesh. You think it shouldn't be able to see, but it lunges at you; and it is surprisingly agile.

Title: Soldiers
Description:
Previous explorers, or a creation of the Star Tomb itself.
They bark something as you round the corner; no language you know of. There is a glow in their eyes.
They are not themselves.
They raise their weapons.
